laboratory_examinations.findings: White-cell count: 13,000 per cubic millimeter (reference range, 4500 to 11,000); normal differential count.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased to 15,800 per cubic millimeter six days later.
Increased to 19 mg per liter two days later.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Single-breath carbon monoxide diffusing capacity: 21.38 ml per minute per millimeter of mercury (68% of the predicted value); decreased residual volume: 0.94 liters (47% of the predicted value).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up tests showed complete normalization of the carbon monoxide diffusing capacity.
